1.name: Lady Dior Bag
1.description: Unisex Eau de Parfum - Chypre Notes
descriptionText: Miss Dior Eau de Parfum reinvents itself with a new scent.

In 1947, Miss Dior was born out of love with a promise to create a fragrance that would re-enchant the lives of women and open up their hearts to new possibilities. With a floral bouquet, it delivers a blend of vibrant notes intertwined with renewed happiness, poetry, and harmony for Christian Dior.

review_details.title: Long lasting and Luxurious
review_details.content: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was super excited to be receiving a Dior perfume as I've always heard great things and when I've smelled them in store they have always been divine. This perfume has a pretty strong scent so if it isn't your thing it's probably not for you. This floral notes mixed with almost a vanilla/musk finish are amazing. The perfume comes in a beautiful box with plastic wrap around it. Inside the bottle is a beautiful bottle with a cute ribbon around the top. This isn't something I would've picked for myself but I love stepping outside the box and would definitely repurchase in the future.

2.name: Gris Dior
2.description: Unisex Eau de Parfum - Chypre Notes
descriptionText: GRIS DIOR, THE CHYPRE-ROSY SILHOUETTE PLEATED WITH CONTRASTS.

Gris Dior eau de parfum is an olfactory enigma that forms an indivisible whole, a reflection of its namesake color. Like chypre-rosy pleats, Gris Dior unfolds its different floral and woody facets in turn.

review_details.title: Gris Wrapping Service
review_details.content: A sensation of fullness and volume is thus created, a unisex silhouette with multiple olfactory hues that come together in a mysterious chypre
